content.text:
Here is a client-ready memo for the task:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO: Customer Service Representative Responsibilities

As a senior Customer Service Representative, your primary duties include:

• Communicating with customers via phone and in-person to address inquiries
• Providing accurate information about our products and services
• Processing customer orders and entering them into our system
• Handling account cancellations and closures as requested
• Documenting details of customer complaints for resolution
• Offering friendly, professional service to enhance customer satisfaction
• Identifying sales opportunities when appropriate
• Maintaining up-to-date knowledge of company offerings
• Resolving issues promptly or escalating to management as needed

Remember to actively listen, remain patient and courteous, and strive to exceed customer expectations in every interaction. Your role is vital in representing our company and ensuring a positive customer experience.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
